Package com.example.ex4

Class WebController

java.lang.Object
com.example.ex4.WebController
@Controller public class WebController extends Object
Controller for all web requests (all requests which return HTML).

    • home

      @GetMapping("/") public String home​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws IOException
      Handler for the landing page/login page/home page.
      Parameters:
      response - the response
      model - the model to use when rendering the view (the login page)
      Returns:
      the name of the login page template
      Throws:
      IOException - if redirect fails

    • login

      @PostMapping("/login") public String login​(@ModelAttribute ChatUser user, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws IOException
      Login of a new of existing user.

      There are three flows to this function: 1. Returning user with the right name - should be logged in successfully. 2. New user with a free name - should be logged in successfully. 3. New user with a taken name - should be rejected.

      Parameters:
      user - the attempted new user
      model - the model
      response - the response
      request - the request
      Returns:
      the name of the template to use
      Throws:
      IOException - if redirect fails

    • loginGet

      @GetMapping("/login") public void loginGet​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Handler for erroneous get requests
      Parameters:
      response - the response
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if redirect fails
